remarks: Lemma for Pigeonhole Principle.  A natural number is equinumerous to its successor minus any element of the successor.  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1998.)
statement:
phplem2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
phplem2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
phplem3 $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. suc A ) -> A ~~ ( suc A \ { B } ) ) $.
